documents.document: @TrueLifeOfBrian no, Russell Crowe/ Kenneth Branaugh, I am not.

@DrewBensley Totally. It must have been hard having more than one son because she could never say 'Who's my favourite boy?!'
Middle-aged Mum literally dancing to the song 'It's just a little crush' in Coles Back to School aisle made my day.
It's not all doom & gloom, Ramshackle Fiasco (Tom Gibson, Emo Parsonson @hamishhudson and I) are back at Uni Pub! https://t.co/XVVNOF2VsN
@VarshaBhargavi @codie__bell @whyloiter @WomensMarchCBR Good on you women! I grew up in Hyderabad - great to see this activism for women.
@wapple15 We were there, I promise! #technicaldifficulties at the station. On the bright side, we're getting podcast ready :)
Great day for a swim. https://t.co/L464SbIGiO
@wapple15 I recommend you continue to drink while listening to us!

@marcuskelson @wapple15 @2XXFM yep, understood. Thanks ;:)
@marcuskelson @wapple15 @2XXFM Overachiever! Do you ever tune in? We'd welcome your tips on how we can improve our Weds 7-8.30am brekky show

@wapple15 Weblink to come when art is done but 24 Feb Uni Pub https://t.co/JqtZ4laZoR
@wapple15 @marcuskelson Yes, it's a real shame. Hoping for many tech improvements for ol' 2xx in 2017. Also, come see our show in Feb, Wes!
@wapple15 @2XXFM I know you've got our backs, Lord Wes :) Thanks for listening and we love your tweets ðŸ‘
@wapple15 Now, now, I'll hear nothing bad about Tom and Emo. Literally, have you seen the @2XXFM website?
The only time I'd be glad about a JetSkier nearby. https://t.co/mVSvAg7ivx
Enjoyed visiting #Geelong where even public art supports the footy team. https://t.co/H3bSktFR0v
@wapple15 I fear I miss #TheBrightSide more than it misses me, but bless you Sir Wes!
The Bright Side is on this morning on @2XXFM with new tracks including one from #Canberra's @mondecreen. Streaming broken so tune to 98.3fm
@lukeheggie @ABC2 @abciview what a brilliant, hilarious dissection of Australia that was!
@hamishhudson @2XXFM you're the best H. Bring a guitar next week!

@cheryanne @comedyactcbr Hey thanks! @Rumwillis was on there too but Tom has no Twitter game (that we know of).
Hope you win best comedy release @lukeheggie at the ARIAs! #best
@Becky_Lucas89 yeah. And office farewells/ congratulations/ happy birthdays also mean I have to balance out 5 introverts with lunacy.
@Becky_Lucas89 I know this. x

Just felt my first earthquake - 6.6 magnitude. Really scary. In Wellington.
